content: कपालिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Furnished with or having a skull; <ls>Y. 3. 243.</ls> {@--2@} Wearing skulls; कपालि वा स्यादथवेंदुशेखरं (वपु) <ls>Ku. 5. 78.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An epithet of Śiva; करं कर्णे कुर्वंत्यपि किल कपालिप्रभृतयः <ls>G. L. 28.</ls> {@--2@} A man of low caste (offspring of a Brāhmaṇa mother and fisherman father). --नी <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā.
